attributes.action: Make being an organ donor compulsory unless you opt out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No-one wants to consider their own death which is why there are not enough donors. People should not be waiting for donor organs or worse facing death unecessarily, please sign this petition to help these people.

rejection.details:
There are several petition already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/donor4transplant/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
